headline: The RealReal Transforms Operations with Motorola Solutions AI-Enabled Video Security Technology
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & CHICAGO, January 08, 2026--In the world of luxury resale, every item is a unique SKU, making inventory intake a significant challenge. The RealReal (NYSE: REAL), the world’s largest online marketplace for authenticated luxury consignment, has deployed Motorola Solutions’ (NYSE: MSI) AI-enabled video security solutions to transform inventory intake from a multi-day manual process into a streamlined digital workflow, reducing asset protection operational overhead while securing mil
